title: Life's burning desire
creator_credit: Stephen Cummins, Martin Guinness, Feel Good Films and Fleur Productions
brief_description: ‘Life burnings desire’ follows the path of dancer, choreographer and actor Paul Mercurio. Specifically, the programme focuses on Mercurio’s work with CONTACT, a new dance theatre piece conceived, choreographed and performed by Mercurio and his dance company ACE (Australian Choreographic Ensemble). His relationship with this project serves as a metaphor for his wider body of work.
